channel.title: Blogs on DanySpin97's site
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on DanySpin97's site

item.title: Termish = malloc(255 * size)
item.description: This is the preface for a series of post on terminal apps, called Termish. But why? I love staying in the terminal. A lot of things are faster to do and I don’t have to move my hands away from keyboard every now and then. The problem is: we don’t always have the right tool to use. Plus, a lot of goodies don’t have visibility. We will explore these programs covering a great range of categories, including a usage example for each one.
